alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Noxubee and southern Lowndes Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bent Oak, or 7 miles southwest of Columbus, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bent Oak and Bigbee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
